title: Transworld - Hallelujah
description: Transworld Video #22. Introducing GoPro footage to skateboarding, Hallelujah lets Tyler Bledsoe set the stage by flipping in and out of endless slides and grinds. Pete Eldridge demonstrates his ambidextrous tendencies in his section. Ryan Decenzo chomped monstrous rail and hubbas like your thickest uncle at an all-you-can-eat joint. Taylor Bingaman was put on the map after he left no terrain untouched in his part, including his backside overcrook down Hollywood 16.
